phrases: I messed up the cake again!
If you stay calm, it should work.
That is the hardest thing for me
This is the result of Mei Lin-sama
trying to make a delicious cake for you, Shao Lan-sama.
It is the thought that counts.
Mei Lin-sama made it with all her heart.
I am sure you are a broad-minded person.
So are you going to bear in mind such trivial matters?
But it is not only this'
Say, she would come hugging me all of a sudden.
How many times have I told you
not to come hugging me all of a sudden!
I do not want to go back!
The pictures are very well taken.
Onii-chan said he took it at the Literary Fest.
Your brother must be very good at taking pictures.
It is just the camera was good.
Hey, I have got some pictures from the play we did earlier'
Did you tell the teacher that you are going back to Hong Kong?
There might be other things besides just taking attendance.
Shao Lan, you do not care if I go back or not.
There is nothing I can do.
Auntie said you had to go back.
There is nothing you can do'
Am I being a bother to you?!
Am I a bother being here?
Mei Lin has to go back.
I have an announcement for everyone.
Mei Lin-san is transferring back to Hong Kong next week.
This must be sad for her.
Why do not you stay over at my house?
Father is going to make a really tasty cake!
so it is got to taste very good.
Besides' I want to chat with you about many things!
I am sorry for borrowing Mei Lin-chan all of a sudden.
Why did you ask her all of a sudden'
It is true that I have lots of things
I want to chat with Mei Lin.
Besides, she will be so sad
I will let Wei know about it.
You are on your own, right?
Sorry for bothering you all the time.
Yes, she is staying over, she said.
No, I have never met her before.
Your father is really a good cook.
Come to think of it, where is that bath sponge?
coz that girl is staying' over.
Well, this is probably much more fun for me!
I got so much to eat, and the food is so good here.
My my, I look real cool!
I hope Sakura-chan is having a nice chat with Mei Lin'
I will have to push myself to finish them all!
It will be such a waste if I do not finish all of it.
Li-kun is a very good cook too.
I do not think Li-kun thinks that
you are a bother, you know?
Because he is always worried about you.
or when we are capturing the cards.
It it is different than what I want.
Hey, since when did you start liking that guy?
And you have a crush on him?
For me' it was not exactly like a crush'
In Hong Kong, I lived very close to Shao Lan.
Because I do not have magic powers,
I did not need to study magic.
But Shao Lan and I did have
martial art lessons together with Wei.
But Shao Lan does not smile at all.
Nor does he like to play.
I have never seen him did anything fun before.
That is why I would watch him sometimes.
I am going to look for it!
So he went looking for it.
And then, the rain started to come down,
but still Shao Lan has not come back.
So there was such a story.
I am not too clear too.
I have grown to like him a lot,
But it is not the same for Shao Lan.
He made a promise with me, but'
I do not have any magic.
Even if I stay with him, I cannot do anything for him.
There is no need for me to be here to help him look for the cards.
Mei Lin-chan, you are not going?
Everything in the art museum is doubled.
There are plenty of things that no one else but you can do.
Did not your house become double as well?
Return to thy form which thou should be!
if you only capture one of the twins.
They have to be caught exactly at the same moment!
' Has to be at the same moment'?'
They noticed a gap in time'
If it is not exactly the same moment'
Even there is just a gap, they will notice.
Want To try one more time?
But is it going to work?
We got to try, if nothing else!
You and Mei Lin-chan might be able
to move just like the Twin.
Because you have always watched Li-kun!
Return to thy form which thou should be!
I have never thought of you as a bother.
The noisy bratty girl's going to leave us.
You did not forget anything else, right?
Let me take care of boarding procedures.
I will contact you when we arrive.
Hey, do you remember that promise?
So I will be your bride!
Because you are the one I love most!
if you find someone you love more than me.
Until you find someone you love most,
We will see each other again, right?
I will definitely come back to be near Shao Lan.
